description: [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) reflectively loads stored, previously encrypted components of the PE file into memory of the currently executing process to avoid writing content to disk on the executing machine.(Citation: Elastic Pikabot 2024)

external_references.description: Daniel Stepanic & Salim Bitam. (2024, February 23). PIKABOT, I choose you!. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
